description:
What is the course about ? I love showing people how i managed to create good content. So i am going to show you how to make professional looking videos with no experience.

Why would you need this ?

1. Because Sony Vegas is a really good and complex software, and it will become handy to know how to work with it.

2. I will talk about everything you need to know in order for you to make your video unique.

3. I will add NEW and useful lectures every 2-3 days !

3. I will show you how to work with Green Screen , How to master the Timeline , how to add Color Gradient , How to add Preset Packs, Add and animate a text , Cut a video , Add music in the background , Masking tool and many many more to come !

You will be able to make professional looking intros/videos/and more. In no time

I'm not claiming that i am a true professional but i know almost everything that will make your video kick in.

I have used this program for years and i know the basics of it.


What are you waiting for ! I'm waiting for you to enroll and learn with us.

Vegas Pro 13.
title: Sony Vegas Pro
